Blog Info

This blog is based on the excellent Hyde theme (v2.1.0) for Poole, running on Github Pages with the following modifications:

  • Tags
  • Post archive
  • Footnotes (because kramdown)
  • Excerpts on index page
  • Pinch and zoom on touch devices
  • Video embeds with fluidvids.js
  • Rouge syntax highlighter, modified version of dracula.css
  • Google Analytics
  • Comment (option to use Google+ or Disqus)
  • Switch to https if accessing site through http
  • Jekyll SEO

The source code for this blog is available here.
